original_text: King Josiah told the people to have the Passover festival in Jerusalem, to give honour to the Lord. They killed the lambs for the Passover meal on the 14th day of the first month of the year.
korean_text: 요시야가 예루살렘에서 여호와께 유월절을 지켜 첫째 달 열넷째 날에 유월절 어린 양을 잡으니라

sentences.original_text: to have the Passover festival in Jerusalem
to give honour to the Lord
They killed the lambs for the Passover meal
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 유월절 식사를 위해 어린 양을 잡았으며

sentences.original_text: on the 14th day of the first month of the year
sentences.korean_translation: 해의 첫째 달 열넷째 날에 그렇게 했다
